column3: ~0. What is the motivation? This is generally useful information to have. You've also changed the file permissions.

Concept ACK on increasing signal-to-noise for our dear non-developer end-users by making debug style benchmarking output opt-in via `-debug`. The file permission change seems like a mistake though? :)
@fanquake @practicalswift file permissions fixed - I'll keep an eye out for that in future, thanks.
Why? This is useful information we use for bitcoinperf, and don't necessarily want to enable more severe debugging.
You still haven't provided any motivation, this would likely just be a detriment to existing tools, and as mentioned above, this information is useful to have when not benchmarking/debugging.
At least let him make his case before closing.\n\nConsider re-opening.
@fanquake The motivation is to make logging optional, as it already the case with most of the logging. I don't always want this logged, and so I would like it to be optional.
